sentence.text: In nucleosome disassembly, cells which simultaneously express both sets of markers have the highest tumor initiating capacity.

In ALDH<sup>+</sup>CD24<sup>-</sup>CD44<sup>+</sup> BCSCs, we identified P4HA2, leukotriene metabolic process and RAB40B as potential prognostic markers, which were virtually related to the status of BCSCs and tumor growth in TNBC cells
